author: cnbc.com
title: United States Steel Corporation Declares Dividend
text:
PITTSBURGH, Jan. 31, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- United States Steel Corporation (NYSE:X) announced today that its Board of Directors declared a dividend of $0.05 per share on U. S. Steel Common Stock. The dividend is payable March 8, 2018, to stockholders of record at the close of business February 9, 2018.
